mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product (product_no, product_name, category_no_fk, cost_price, selling_price, profit, qty, hit, is_best, filesMain, reg_date) values(product_seq.nextval, #{product_name}, #{category_no_fk}, #{cost_price}, #{selling_price}, (#{cost_price} - ${selling_price}), #{qty}, 0, #{is_best}, #{filesMain}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from tbl_product, tbl_product_content where product_no = #{product_no} and tbl_product.product_no = tbl_product_content.pno_fk
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product_file(fullName, pno_fk) values(#{fullName}, product_seq.currval)
insert into tbl_product_content(content, pno_fk) values(#{content}, product_seq.currval)
mapper.select: select fullName from tbl_product_file where pno_fk = #{pno_fk} order by reg_date
select count(product_no) from tbl_product where product_no > 0
